name: Ice Attack
overview: Ice Attack is a small arcade game, based on Pengo. The player controls a penguin trapped in a freezing sea of ice. The penguin tries to escape - and to do this, must move 3 radioactive cubes next to each other (horizontally or vertically). Giant spiders hunt for the penguin, but he can smash them using ice blocks. The game has a time limit (60 seconds).
